task.title: McFitFun Recipe
task.shortdesc: This English muffin recipie is a healthier at-home version of McDonalds Egg McMuffin!

taskbody.prereq:
Materials for this recipe include a toaster. The ingredients are as follows:
1 whole wheat English muffin
1 egg
1 slice of tomato
10 oz Swiss or Monterey Jack cheese
2T avocado (or 3 very thin slices)
1T peanut butter (or almond butter)
1 sliced banana
drizzle of honey

step.cmd: Heat a lightly oiled skillet over medium heat, and cook your egg however you desire.
Toast your English muffin in the toaster to your desired toastiness.
Immediately after removing the English muffin from the toaster, put the cheese on the bottom half so it begins to melt.
Layer the cheesy side with the tomato, egg, and avocado.
Spread the peanut butter (or almond butter) on the muffin.
Add the sliced banana pieces, and a small drizzle of honey.
Serve your muffin while singing the McDonalds theme song, and enjoy.
